definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: It’s a very foreboding Victorian institution.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个非常有维多利亚预感的机构。
不久他们的预感就成为了现实。

sentences.english: I don't have too good of a feeling towards the gril.
sentences.chinese: 我对这女孩没有什么太好的预感。

sentences.english: A presentiment of the future; a foreboding.
sentences.chinese: 他一直有祸事临头的预感。

sentences.english: For an instant, I thought that I understood my own feelings of incredulity.
sentences.chinese: 我立刻想到我理解了我个人怀疑的预感了。

sentences.english: A: I see France losing this game, as Zidane is being sent off.
sentences.chinese: 我预感到法国队要输了，就在齐达内杯罚下后。

sentences.english: And what if this is premonition ?
sentences.chinese: 如果这只是预感怎么办？

sentences.english: I had a hunch that the plan would end in success.
sentences.chinese: 我有预感那项计画会成功。

sentences.english: I have an vision…Tailang will return.
sentences.chinese: 我将有种预感太郎要回来了。

sentences.english: Hunching over, chatting on your cell, or being distracted by your iPod or text messages make you an easy target for a bad guy.
sentences.chinese: 由聊天或使你分心的短信可以预感到那是一个坏家伙。
人在任何情况下都有预感。

sentences.english: He had a presentiment of trouble coming.
sentences.chinese: 他一直有祸事临头的预感。

sentences.english: To test my hunch, I did a sudden lurch into the Spiderhead.
sentences.chinese: 为了验证我的预感，我一推门闯进了“蜘蛛头”里。

sentences.english: Hobgoblin soldier(HS): I have a really good feeling about this.
sentences.chinese: 我有一种非常好的预感。

sentences.english: I had a hunch you were gonna ask me out.
sentences.chinese: 我早有预感你会约我出去。

sentences.english: There were furrows in the old brow, and I had a kind of foreboding feeling.
sentences.chinese: 他眉宇间有些许深纹，这让我有种不祥的预感。

definition: omen/sign (of sth yet to occur)/prior indication/to foreshadow
sixth sense (i.e. intuition, premonition, telepathy etc)
(of a turn of events) not too encouraging/far from good/anything but reassuring
omen/sign (that sth is about to happen)/warning sign
to be convinced/to be sure/to firmly believe/to be positive that/definite news
